title: Help with this font on tshirt. Specially for the swash
content:
what the name is this font "Be The Change The World" and where I can find it? specially for the swash too

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134555im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ItkGWpf_5628.jpg)

Font: 

 Script Monotype with font editing 

Solved By: 

 [donshottype](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134555/http:/typophile.com/user/205259 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ItkGWpf.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134555/http:/typophile.com/files/ItkGWpf.jpg) | 120.98 KB |
author: nhata

comments.content:
Lettering in a a thick casual swashed style often called baseball or ballpark. See for example [http://www.myfonts.com/search/tag%3A%22baseball+script%22/fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134555/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/tag%3A%22baseball+script%22/fonts/ "http://www.myfonts.com/search/tag%3A%22baseball+script%22/fonts/")  
Don

nice I found it. actually that font by Script Monotype family with little editing.  
thank you
